name: Administration of chapter
text: [§671-6]  Administration of chapter.  The director of commerce and consumer affairs shall be responsible for the implementation and administration of this chapter and shall adopt rules, in conformity with chapter 91, necessary for the purposes of this chapter. [L 1976, c 219, pt of §2; am L 1982, c 204, §8; am L 1983, c 124, §17]
